thread.title: Bernadette McKenna

author: Bernadette McKenna
title: Bernadette McKenna
text:
On reviewing my contract I spoke with a very nice person called Andrew. I was a bit bamboozaled with maths and figures but once I took time to digest his calculations I decided that on the whole he was probably right. The deal wAs done on projected usage. Looks like I save a little but only time will tell. At the end of the day there is not much in it but you have to
Renegotiate every year. This is important.
